tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This was my first experience with Dr Swati and as I was pregnant. I chose to visit her simply because she was the nearest accessible Dr with good reviews. I would like to mention on the first consultation I knew they gonna be my only Gynae and obstetrician here on. Dr Swati goes out of their way to make you comfortable. They  were  throughout there with me  while I was pregnant and post partum also to help just a message or call away. I haven‚Äôt came across any Dr like them. I am immensely grateful to her for their support, services and motivation she had provided throughout my pregnancy. They are the most non judgmental Dr, You can just approach them regarding any issue and would be happy to help you. They have immense knowledge and will guide you through with her counselling.
I am really really satisfied and would recommend Dr Swati to everyone. You can be just carefree if you are consulting them. She will take care of you like their own. Lastly, I would like to thank Dr swati for just being you.
reply_text: Thankyou for your kind words and your faith in me. Enjoy the journey ahead with your little one .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a great experience with Dr. Swati. We are blessed with baby boy . We thank to Dr. Swati for taking care of everything before and after pregnancy as well. She gave us very good advice everytime whenever we had an issue she was always available on call. We would highly recommend Dr. Swati to everyone. Thank you

She is much motivated Dr ever seen. 

She is available 24*7 for us via phone and treat the patient with full care.

One thing special is that the Dr swati only prescribe medicine which are actually needed . She doesn't believe in giving extra medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ***** ******** ** * **** **** * **** ************ Before meeting with Dr. Swati Mehrotra i have consulted with few other gynecologist who are just professional with their patients. However Dr. Swati Mehrotra is out of the world I would say, she  not only listen everyone very patiently n calmly and give personal touch to all. Because of Dr. Swati Mehrotra i conceive naturally and also completed my pregnancy period. She handled my delivery are just superb in spite of so many complications. She managed so well and give her o/s support all the time. We finally blessed with a healthy baby boy on 31.aug.2022. In this entire period. I feel blessed with the support, guidance care and the empathy of Dr. Swati Mehrotra she is an angel for me . In the beginning of my pregnancy there were time when I feel very nervous and low and I will give Dr.Swati Mehrotra all the credit for giving me the strength positivity an utmost care, she treat all her patients like family members and gives all great advice with big smile. I would really recommend everyone to refer to her. Finally a big thanks to Dr. Swati Mehrotra to support and guide me.
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback... your faith in me always kept things going for us..  God bless your family... I am overwhelmed by your words

review: The doctor was very friendly. She explained everything to me very well.  She gave solution of all the issues and other knowledge.
reply_text: Thankyou for your feedback Ankita... Wish you good health

review:
Little late to announce but we are happy to inform you all that we are blessed with a baby girl on October 2021 This is my wife first pregnancy and our journey with doctor Swati Mehrotra started at the very beginning of my wife pregnancy . Due to some complication my wife have C-section delivery due to breach baby position but dr. Swati tried her best till the end to have a normal delivery . 
More than a doctor she is an angel to us.  Dr Swati gave us very good advice every time other via phone and it's rare to find a doctor that combines Such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care and moreover even after the post delivery Dr. Swati took good care nd advice.
I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND DR. SWATI MEHROTRA , *** **** *** **** ** *** ** *** **** ***** ** **** ***** **SO if u looking for good gnea, then this is a must visit....
reply_text: Thankyou for your kind words... wish you good health and happiness

Very thankful to find such a doctor for the very anxious part of my pregnancy.
